metaDescription: Luxury new build villa in Torretas, Torrevieja. 3 beds, 3 baths, piscine privée, solarium. Modern Costa Blanca living at its finest.
heroIntro:
Welcome to your new home in Torretas, Torrevieja – a thoughtfully designed new build villa that captures the essence of modern Mediterranean living. This three-bedroom villa represents a smart investment in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after developments, combining contemporary architecture with practical Spanish coastal lifestyle. Built across two floors with 105m² of quality living space on a 115m² plot, this villa offers the perfect balance between intimate family living and entertaining guests in the Spanish sun.

Located in the Torretas neighborhood of Torrevieja, you're positioned in a peaceful residential area that maintains convenient access to the town's amenities. The villa features three spacious bedrooms and three full bathrooms, ensuring comfort for family and guests. The open-plan kitchen flows seamlessly into the living area, while fitted wardrobes throughout maximize storage. A private solarium and terrace extend your living space outdoors – essential for enjoying Torrevieja's 320 days of annual sunshine.

What sets this property apart is its thoughtful design for modern living. The private pool and dedicated parking space on your plot provide both recreational enjoyment and practical convenience. New build properties in this development come with modern utilities, quality finishes, and the assurance of contemporary build standards. Whether you're seeking a permanent Mediterranean home, a holiday retreat, or an investment property, this villa in Torretas delivers on multiple fronts.
investmentSection:
Torrevieja has consistently attracted investment from both European retirees and portfolio investors. The rental market remains robust throughout the year, benefiting from tourism during summer months and established communities of long-term residents. New build properties like this villa appeal to renters seeking modern facilities, complete kitchens, and private pools – premium features that command higher nightly rates during peak season.

The area's infrastructure continues improving with new roads, commercial developments, and residential expansions. Foreign investment and residency policies in Spain remain favorable, while property prices in Torretas remain competitive compared to more saturated coastal areas. A villa with private pool, three bedrooms, and modern build standards represents a property type consistently in demand from both holiday renters and potential residents seeking reliable rental income during off-season periods.

faqs.question: Is the private pool included with the villa?
faqs.answer: Yes, the villa comes with a private swimming pool included on your plot. This is a significant amenity that enhances both personal enjoyment and rental income potential if you choose to offer holiday lets.

faqs.question: What utilities and services are included in the new build?
faqs.answer: New build villas in this development come with modern utilities including mains electricity, water supply, and sewage connections. The property meets current Spanish building codes and includes modern heating and hot water systems. Internet and television services are available from multiple providers in the area.

faqs.question: Are property taxes high in Torrevieja?
faqs.answer: Spanish property taxes are generally reasonable. You'll pay an annual property tax (IBI) based on the cadastral value, typically ranging from 0.4-1.1% of the registered value. Additional considerations include maintenance fees if applicable. Consulting with a local tax advisor will provide exact figures for this property.

faqs.question: Can I rent the villa to tourists if I purchase it?
faqs.answer: Yes, holiday rentals are permitted in Torrevieja and the surrounding area. Many property owners successfully generate income through platforms like Airbnb and Booking.com. Your rental potential depends on factors like location, amenities, and marketing, but properties with private pools in this area consistently attract renters year-round.

faqs.question: What's the process for purchasing as a non-Spanish resident?
faqs.answer: Non-EU citizens can purchase property in Spain with proper documentation and NIE number (Spanish tax identification). EU citizens have unrestricted purchase rights. The process typically involves opening a Spanish bank account, registering for tax purposes, and completing the purchase through a notary. Most developers and real estate agents are experienced in supporting international buyers through this process.

faqs.question: How far is the airport from this property?
faqs.answer: Alicante-Elche Airport is approximately 50km north of Torrevieja, roughly a 45-50 minute drive. The motorway connection is excellent, making airport access straightforward for those traveling frequently. Regular shuttle services and car rental options are available at the airport.

locationSection.intro:
Torretas is an increasingly popular residential neighborhood within Torrevieja, attracting families and investors who appreciate quieter surroundings without sacrificing convenience. The area has developed significantly in recent years with quality new builds, creating a modern community atmosphere while retaining the authentic Spanish coastal character. Torrevieja itself is a vibrant town of approximately 100,000 residents, offering the perfect blend of tourist amenities and local Spanish culture.

Torrevieja's climate is one of Spain's most consistent, with warm, dry summers and mild winters. The Mediterranean atmosphere permeates daily life here – from morning paseos to evening gatherings in local plazas. The town has transformed from a salt-mining village into a thriving coastal destination, maintaining its working-class authenticity while welcoming international residents and visitors.
